c74object.name: tap.jit.kernel
c74object.description: The tap.jit.kernel object will generate a single-plane gaussian blob at the specified coordinates.

attribute.name: center
attribute.description: The coordinates for the center of the gaussian kernel within the matrix.

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: The size of the kernel on the horizontal and vertical axes.

attribute.name: weight
attribute.description: A weight factor which is applied to both the horizontal and vertical sizes of the gaussian kernel.
